mapper.select: SELECT su_idx,su_name,su_is_blind FROM cbt_subject ORDER BY su_idx DESC
SELECT su_name FROM cbt_subject WHERE su_name = #{chkSub}
SELECT su_name,su_idx FROM cbt_subject WHERE su_is_blind = 0
SELECT sc_name FROM cbt_subject_chapter WHERE sc_name = #{chkSubChap}
SELECT su_idx, su_name, (select count(pc_idx) FROM cbt_problem_create WHERE su_idx = cbt_subject.su_idx) as subCnt FROM cbt_subject ORDER BY su_idx asc;
SELECT sc_idx, sc_name, su_idx, (select count(pc_idx) FROM cbt_problem_create where sc_idx = cbt_subject_chapter.sc_idx) as chapcnt FROM cbt_subject_chapter ORDER BY sc_idx asc;
